summary: Service Catalogue V2 Phase 1 testing complete. All 34 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend verified: cleaning services removed from navigation, /services page loads correctly with 4 service categories.
critical_code_review_comments: V2 Service Catalogue properly implements pack hierarchy (Essential → Plus → Pro)
Document inheritance working correctly: Essential=5, Plus=11 (5+6), Pro=15 (11+4)
Add-on pricing correctly implemented: Fast Track +£20, Printed Copy +£25
Admin V2 APIs properly protected with admin_route_guard
Public V2 APIs correctly exclude CVP-only features
All 12 services seeded correctly (11 public + 1 CVP subscription)
Cleaning services successfully removed from PublicHeader.js and ServicesHubPage.js
seed_data_creation: No test data created - used existing seeded catalogue data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Service Catalogue V2 Phase 1 fully implemented and tested. V2 APIs at /api/public/v2/* and /api/admin/services/v2/*. 12 services in catalogue (3 AI Automation, 2 Market Research, 3 Compliance, 3 Document Packs, 1 CVP Subscription). Pack hierarchy working with document inheritance. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_service_catalogue_v2.py covers all V2 endpoints.

public_v2_apis.GET /api/public/v2/services/by-category: PASS - Groups services by category correctly
public_v2_apis.GET /api/public/v2/services/document-pac: PASS - Returns 3 packs in tier order with inherited docs
public_v2_apis.GET /api/public/v2/services/{service_cod: PASS - Returns CRM field dictionary intake fields
PASS - Adds £25 for printed copy (doc packs only)

admin_v2_apis.GET /api/admin/services/v2/: PASS - Requires admin auth, returns all 12 services
admin_v2_apis.GET /api/admin/services/v2/stats: PASS - Returns correct counts by category

frontend.cleaning_services_removed_from_header: PASS - Services dropdown shows only 4 services

mocked_apis.note: All V2 catalogue APIs use real MongoDB database
